entry.title: New release for ebook2audiobook: v25.6.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • last v25.5.29 fixes by @ROBERT-MCDOWELL in https://github.com/DrewThomasson/ebook2audiobook/pull/762
  • V25.5.29 correction by @ROBERT-MCDOWELL in https://github.com/DrewThomasson/ebook2audiobook/pull/763
  • Docker compose patch 1 by @DrewThomasson in https://github.com/DrewThomasson/ebook2audiobook/pull/766
  • fixing docker compose and adding podman compose by @DrewThomasson in https://github.com/DrewThomasson/ebook2audiobook/pull/768
  • Add GPU wiki link by @DrewThomasson in https://github.com/DrewThomasson/ebook2audiobook/pull/770
  • Dockerfile patch 1 by @DrewThomasson in https://github.com/DrewThomasson/ebook2audiobook/pull/772
  • Add updates to torch tags here as well by @DrewThomasson in https://github.com/DrewThomasson/ebook2audiobook/pull/774
  • update to work with dynamic cuda dockerfile by @DrewThomasson in https://github.com/DrewThomasson/ebook2audiobook/pull/775
  • Push Dynamic Docker updates into main by @DrewThomasson in https://github.com/DrewThomasson/ebook2audiobook/pull/773
  • Add inline comment to app.py by @newfadel in https://github.com/DrewThomasson/ebook2audiobook/pull/769
  • Fixing docker build+test workflow by @DrewThomasson in https://github.com/DrewThomasson/ebook2audiobook/pull/777
  • Fixing docker Build+Test workflow by @DrewThomasson in https://github.com/DrewThomasson/ebook2audiobook/pull/778
  • reverting comment that breaks by @DrewThomasson in https://github.com/DrewThomasson/ebook2audiobook/pull/780
  • v25.6.2 by @ROBERT-MCDOWELL in https://github.com/DrewThomasson/ebook2audiobook/pull/784
  • V25.6.2 by @ROBERT-MCDOWELL in https://github.com/DrewThomasson/ebook2audiobook/pull/785

New Contributors

  • @newfadel made their first contribution in https://github.com/DrewThomasson/ebook2audiobook/pull/769

Full Changelog: https://github.com/DrewThomasson/ebook2audiobook/compare/v25.5.29...v25.6.2

entry.title: New release for ebook2audiobook: v25.6.6
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Adding AsmrRacoon fine-tune by @DrewThomasson in https://github.com/DrewThomasson/ebook2audiobook/pull/783
  • Dockercompose patch 1 by @DrewThomasson in https://github.com/DrewThomasson/ebook2audiobook/pull/788
  • Removing the other pre-build versions that are not working by @DrewThomasson in https://github.com/DrewThomasson/ebook2audiobook/pull/789
  • fix default to work with M1 Mac for podman-compose by @DrewThomasson in https://github.com/DrewThomasson/ebook2audiobook/pull/795
  • Create cleanup-offline-runners.yml by @DrewThomasson in https://github.com/DrewThomasson/ebook2audiobook/pull/796
  • disabling auto-trigger for lite test by @DrewThomasson in https://github.com/DrewThomasson/ebook2audiobook/pull/797
  • V25 by @DrewThomasson in https://github.com/DrewThomasson/ebook2audiobook/pull/800
  • v25.6.6 by @ROBERT-MCDOWELL in https://github.com/DrewThomasson/ebook2audiobook/pull/802

entry.title: New release for ebook2audiobook: 25.6.14
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • add macos intel condition about transformers and coqui-tts version by @ROBERT-MCDOWELL in https://github.com/DrewThomasson/ebook2audiobook/pull/819
  • adapt mac os intel coqui-tts and transformers versions by @ROBERT-MCDOWELL in https://github.com/DrewThomasson/ebook2audiobook/pull/820
  • [pause] help and readme to 1.4 sec by @ROBERT-MCDOWELL in https://github.com/DrewThomasson/ebook2audiobook/pull/823
  • Update --help output command in readme by @DrewThomasson in https://github.com/DrewThomasson/ebook2audiobook/pull/827
  • v25.6.14 by @ROBERT-MCDOWELL in https://github.com/DrewThomasson/ebook2audiobook/pull/829
